data.title: Penguins of Madagascar (2014) Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Peacock
data.meta_description: Penguins of Madagascar (2014) follows Skipper and co. as they try to save the world. Here's how you can watch the film on Peacock.
data.meta_site_name: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
data.text:
If you’re wondering where to stream the 2014 animated film The Penguins of Madagascar online, then you have come to the right place, as we have all the streaming details. Directed by Eric Darnell and Simon J. Smith, the film centers on a series of adventures that the four Penguins — Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private, undertake to save the global Penguin population from the vicious intentions of Octopus Dave.

Here’s how you can watch and stream Penguins of Madagascar (2014) via streaming services such as Peacock.

Is Penguins of Madagascar (2014) available to watch via streaming?

Yes, Penguins of Madagascar (2014) is available to watch via streaming on Peacock.

The movie revolves around four penguins who find themselves kidnapped and taken into captivity one day by the ruthless Pacific Octopus, Dave, who disguises as a human named Dr. Octavius Brine. Dave’s intention to feed the penguins all over the world a lethal serum that will transform them into monstrous creatures is an act of revenge against the penguins who, in his opinion, upstaged the Octopus at zoos. Following their lucky escape from Dave’s clutches, the penguins are rescued and helped by an inter-species intelligence agency, the North Wind, consisting of a wolf, polar bear, seal, and owl. Together, they come up with a scheme to stop Dave from carrying out his merciless mission and defeat him for good.

The impressive group of voice cast members includes Tom McGrath, Chris Miller, Christopher Knights, Conrad Vernon, Benedict Cumberbatch, and Ken Jeong, to name a few.

Watch Penguins of Madagascar (2014) streaming via Peacock

Penguins of Madagascar (2014) is available to watch on Peacock.

You can watch Penguins of Madagascar (2014) via Peacock by following these steps:

Go to PeacockTV.com

Click ‘Get Started’

Choose your payment plan

$5.99 per month or $59.99 per year (premium)

$11.99 per month or $119.99 per year (premium plus

Create your account

Enter your payment details

Peacock’s Premium account provides access to over 80,000+ hours of TV, movies, and sports, including current NBC and Bravo Shows, along with 50 always-on channels. Premium Plus is the same plan but with no ads (save for limited exclusions), along with allowing users to download select titles and watch them offline and providing access to your local NBC channel live 24/7.

The synopsis for Penguins of Madagascar (2014) is as follows:

“Skipper, Kowalski, Rico, and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.”

NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
